text:
Sorry for the delay guys! I'm using Ubuntu with a standard terminal command running. I don't get any errors when the task is running just the following:

`Completed uploading files in [file-location]`

It's almost everytime I save the file, it will be 1% of the time where the file goes up and completes successfully, other times it will be empty :thinking_face:

Hi all, I’ve been in my first Junior Developer job for just over two weeks now and I’m going to be working with HubSpot quite a lot. I prefer to work locally so I’ve built a tool which helps me do this without having to upload CSS, JS and images to HubSpot. I’d really appreciate some feedback as I’m only using this for the first time today, and it’s the first thing like this that I’ve made so please bear that in mind haha. Many thanks!

<https://github.com/paulca55/HubSpot-local-development>
This is really great work.  Welcome to the Slack channel
Thank you :) It’s just a work in progress at the moment but hopefully others can use it or modify it to their needs.
